mapper.select: SELECT /* MiscellaneousMapper.getUaCode, UA 코드 정보 조회, 김다슬/인크로스, 2014-01-09 */ ua_cd FROM tb_cm_device WHERE device_model_cd = #{deviceModelNo} AND use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* MiscellaneousMapper.updateServiceAuthYn, 휴대폰 SMS 및 이메일 인증 여부 업데이트(인증성공), 김다슬/인크로스, 2014-01-16 */ tb_cm_svc_auth SET auth_compt_yn = 'Y' , upd_id = 'admin' , upd_dt = SYSDATE WHERE auth_seq = #{authSeq}

UPDATE /* MiscellaneousMapper.updateServiceAuthCnt, 휴대폰 SMS 인증 카운트 업데이트, 김영균/지티소프트, 2014-08-27 */ tb_cm_svc_auth m SET AUTH_CNT = NVL(auth_cnt, 0) + 1
, AUTH_COMPT_YN = 'F'
,upd_dt = SYSDATE WHERE EXISTS(SELECT auth_seq FROM (SELECT auth_seq, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY auth_seq DESC) AS rnum FROM tb_cm_svc_auth WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND system_id = #{systemId} AND auth_mdn = #{authMdn} AND auth_type_cd = #{authTypeCd} /* 인증 타입 (CM010901:SMS, CM010902:Email) */ AND auth_compt_yn = 'N' AND auth_value_create_dt >= (SYSDATE - (#{timeToLive} / 24 / 60)) /* 3분이내 */ ) t WHERE m.auth_seq = t.auth_seq AND t.rnum = 1)
mapper.select: SELECT /* MiscellaneousMapper.confirmSendedSms, 휴대폰 인증 SMS 기발송 확인, 김다슬/인크로스, 2014-06-26 */ auth_seq, auth_sign FROM(SELECT auth_seq , auth_sign , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY auth_seq DESC) rnum FROM tb_cm_svc_auth WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND system_id = #{systemId} AND auth_mdn = #{authMdn} AND auth_type_cd = #{authTypeCd} /* 인증 타입 (CM010901:SMS, CM010902:Email, CM010903:EmailAuthUrl) */ AND auth_compt_yn = 'N' AND ( auth_value_create_dt >= (SYSDATE - (3 / 24 / 60)) AND NVL(auth_cnt, 0) < #{authCnt} ) /* 3분이내, 3회 실패 */ ) WHERE rnum = 1

SELECT /* MiscellaneousMapper.searchEmailAuthYn, 미인증 이메일 코드 존재여부 확인, burkhan_rejoice, 2015-04-15 */ auth_seq , auth_value FROM tb_cm_svc_auth WHERE mbr_no = #{mbrNo} AND auth_compt_yn = 'N' AND auth_type_cd = #{authTypeCd} /* 인증 타입 (CM010901:SMS, CM010902:Email, CM010903:EmailAuthUrl) */
